ARABIC: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so make a clear judgement between me and them and rescue me and the muminun who are with me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So adjudge between me and them conclusively, and save me and the believers who are with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So pass a clear judgement between me and them and rescue me and the believers with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Judge among us and save me and the believers with me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore make a decisive judgement between me and them, and rescue me and the believers along with me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore judge You between me and them, and save me and those of the believers who are with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore judge Thou between me and them with a (just) judgment, and deliver me and those who are with me of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so give true deliverance between me and them, and deliver me and the believers that are with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor judge Thou between us, a (conclusive) judgment, and save me and those believers who are with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: therefore, judge decisively between me and them; and save me and the believers who are with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So decide Thou between me and them with a decision, and deliver me and those who are with me of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So judge conclusively between me and them, and deliver me and the faithful who are with me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Judge Thou, then, between me and them openly, and deliver me and those of the Believers who are with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore judge You between me and them, and save me and those of the believers who are with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So open between me and them an opening, and save me and the believers who are with me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So judge between me and them decisively, and deliver me and the believers who are with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:118] so judge conclusively between me and them, and deliver me and the believers who are with me’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore judge Thou between us, a (conclusive) judgement) a fair judgement, (and save me and those believers who are with me) from their torment.
